A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
First complaint: Screw you Rotten Tomatoes...no way this movie is still sitting at 51% audience score.  Do you even read your customer's reviews?  The vast majority of reviews I read are not positive.  I would wager that the audience score is more like 35-40%.

Second:  Screw you critics.  You are nothing but shills for Disney.  There is no way that 91% of professional critics (who are supposed to know a thing or two about what makes a good movie) found this garbage to be tolerable\, let alone good.

Third: Screw you Rose Tico.  You and your annoying lectures about evil rich people sucked any life that could have been in this movie.

Fourth: Screw you Rian Johnson for what you did to Luke and Leia.  Luke is a curmudgeon and Leia is Peter Pan.  Nice.

Fifth: Screw you Disney.  This was a horrible movie that should have never have seen the light of day.  You ruined this franchise by allowing this movie to be viewed by the general public.  I will not watch another Star Wars movie or story put out by you.
